public void addDivision(FormDivision formDivision)
Adds division with the data from formDivision into database Transforms edited name of division in a look "Aaaaa" (first letter is uppercase, others are lowercase)

findDivisionById

public Division findDivisionById(long id)
Finds Division by id=id from database Compares received id with the id of each division from the database. Returns Division with id, which matched if there isn't any Division with this id, method returns null

Specified by:
findDivisionById in interface IDivisionsService
Parameters:
id - id of searching Division
Returns:
found Division by id
